湪湪湪

湪字的基本解释

湪
tuàn
水名。

湪
nuǎn
古同“渜”，热水，特指洗过澡的水。

湪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuàn］
［《廣韻》通貫切，去换，透。］
水名。
[②]［nuǎn］
同“渜1”。
热水。特指沐浴用过的水。

湪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湪； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第09
【廣韻】通貫切【集韻】吐玩切，?音彖。水名。　又與渜通。【周禮·渜濯註】鄭康成曰：渜，古文作湪。荆沔閒語。【疏】豫州人語。

湪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
湪字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
tuàn
Water name.
Shao
nuǎn
In ancient times, "渜", hot water, especially refers to bathed water.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuàn］
["Guangyun" cuts through, exchanges, and through. ]
Water name.
[②]［nuǎn］
Same as "渜1".
Hot water. Especially refers to the water used in bathing.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　湪; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 09
[Guangyun] Tongguanqi [Jiyun] spit, play and cut,? Sound. Water name.　 and Tong Tong again. [Zhou Li·Luluo's Note] Zheng Kangcheng said: Lu, ancient prose composing 湪. Jing Mian gossiping. [Sparse] Yuzhou people's language.
Shao
